channel.title: Intergenerational on The Little Dataset
channel.description: Recent content in Intergenerational on The Little Dataset

item.title: Social Networks and the Endurance of Economic Injury
item.description: Killing Two Birds with One Paper My last fall semester exam was for Social Economics class. Reading through packets of model summaries, I set out to determine which model – besides the obviously lovable Coate and Loury (1993) – I would most like to understand, remember, and explain. That is, I picked a paper to write about here… which I could also use in my intellectual battle with those pesky blue books.
